name: Get a person's and company's data from Clearbit and add it to a Google Sheet, when a meeting is booked with ScheduleOnce
description: Every time an appointment is scheduled with ScheduleOnce, Make will automatically get the person's details with Clearbit and add that to a Google Sheets row. This example uses the sheet in [this link](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1l205VTOGWG-wurkvc2UmsbVnN0cJbX-6evHJnWcMfaM/edit#gid=0). If a company exists for that person, Make will look up that company with Clearbit and add that data to a row in Google Sheets. This example uses the sheet in [this link](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1vpZhx_ivf3pDeRI-zNSoX8iqsJwq0Jqv-hczd6IQ4XM/edit#gid=0).
